text:
My name is Luciano Canovas, a 20 years old programmer from Argentina.
Currently, I am studying for a degree in Computer Science, which allows me to strengthen my technical skills and broaden my knowledge in various areas of technology.
I specialize in application and game development, and I am constantly exploring new tools and programming languages.
I am seeking opportunities that will enable me to apply my knowledge and grow professionally in dynamic and collaborative environments.
